description: Získejte všechny potřebné informace k misi, které se zobrazí v oknu zásahu.
name: Pomocník k misím

normal.description: Zobrazí pravděpodobnost u vozidel, která mohou být potřeba.
normal.title: Zobrazit pravděpodobnosti

credits.description: Zobrazí průměrný kreditní zisk za splnění mise.
credits.title: Kredity

generatedBy.description: Zobrazí, ze kterého typu budovy je daná mise vygenerována.
generatedBy.title: Vygenerováno budovou: (typ budovy)

hide_battalion_chief_vehicles.description: Skryje VEA a zobrazí pouze MOS
hide_battalion_chief_vehicles.title: Skrýt VEA

battalion_chief_vehicles.description: Subtracts the number of required MCV from Battalion Chief and hides Battalion Chief if the number drops below 0.
battalion_chief_vehicles.title: Battalion Chief Simple Rate

heavy_rescue_vehicles.description: Subtracts the number of required firetrucks from the Heavy Rescue and hides firetrucks if the number drops below 0. This function is intended for people who drive a pure Rescue Engine system.
heavy_rescue_vehicles.title: Heavy Rescue Simple Rate

platform_trucks.description: Subtracts the number of firetrucks from the Quints and hides firetrucks if the number drops below 0.
platform_trucks.title: Quint Simple Rate

noVehicleRequirements.description: Set here which special requirements to show, if they exist for that mission.
noVehicleRequirements.title: Special requirements

allow_arff_instead_of_lf.description: Indicates, if instead of a firetruck arrfs are possible on site.
allow_arff_instead_of_lf.title: Show if arrfs are allowed as firetrucks

allow_rw_instead_of_lf.description: Indicates, if instead of a firetruck also heavy rescue or rescue engine is possible on site.
allow_rw_instead_of_lf.title: Show Heavy Rescue / rescue engine instead of firetrucks

hideWhenNoNeed.description: Hides the patient details if there are no more patients and patients do not appear until the end of the assignment.
hideWhenNoNeed.title: Show patient details only when needed

live.description: Shows at the top of the mission helper how many patients the mission currently has.
live.title: Number of current patients

patient_allow_first_responder_chance.description: Shows with how much % any vehicle is sufficient to treat.
patient_allow_first_responder_chance.title: First Responder Probability

title.description: Shows the heading "Patients" above the details about possible patients.
title.title: Patients (Title)

place.description: Shows next to the title which POI is required for this mission.
place.title: POI

prerequisites.description: Shows the requirements (e.g. 3 rescue stations and 4 fire stations)
prerequisites.title: Prerequisites

live.description: Shows at the top of the mission helper how many prisoners the mission currently has.
live.title: Number of current prisoners

title.description: Shows the heading "Prisoners" above the details about possible prisoners.
title.title: Prisoners (Title)

title.description: Zobrazí název mise, např. "Požár domu", jako nadpis.
title.title: Název mise

type.description: Shows the type number of the mission next to the title.
type.title: Type number

patient_additionals.description: If there are currently more than 20 patients on site, Ambulance Officer is automatically listed at the beginning of the vehicle requirements. If there are currently more than 30 patients on site, MCE is also automatically listed.
patient_additionals.title: Mention Ambulance Officer and MCE extra

sort.caption: Název vozidel
sort.description: Nastaví dle jakého řazení vozidla zobrazit.
sort.title: Seřazení potřebných vozidel

title.description: Zobrazí nadpis "Vozidla" nad potřebným soupisem techniky.
title.title: Vozidla (Nadpis)
